name: Skeleton Bonk
description:
Made for Spooky 2D Jam 2021

You are a witch who has lost her broom. Make your way down to the dungeons and grab the pieces to rebuild it so that you can fly to the win zone! 

The broomstick lies behind the first door, grabbing this and pressing 'e' will allow you to whack skeletons. The brush lies behind the second door and after collecting both pieces of the broom will allow you to fly for a limited amount of time.

A - Move Left

D - Move Right

Space - Jump

E - Whack 

Shift - Fly

F - Open Doors

You can only whack enemies once you grab the broom stick and you can only fly once you grab the broom brush.

Game Art made by CooltineW.
